name: Kitty Fiddles
description: This game is about a kitty who sees a blue fiddle and wants to get it's paws on it, but knowing that the kitty will break the fiddle, you must distract kitty by feeding it treats. After enough time has passed, kitty will get tired and fall asleep and your fiddle will stay intact for another day. If kitty doesn't get it's treats, the fiddle will break and you lose.
